about_the_game:
In Kozyrev Horrors, immerse yourself in a place reminiscent of your former workplace laboratory, where you and other scientists investigated the effects of Kozyrev Mirrors on human extra-sensory perception.

In 1990, Russian scientists conducted experiments with Kozyrev Mirrors to enhance extra-sensory perception. Participants, referred to as Psychonauts, reported disturbing experiences, including sightings of mysterious entities known as "The Observers." Take on the role of Irina, a scientist seeking answers after her friend Viktor disappeared during a journey into the mirrors, resulting in a coma.

Silence in the Darkness:

Sudden movements or noises may attract an unknown presence lurking in the darkness. Stay alert and cautious, as you never know what lies hidden in the shadows.

Find Your Way Back:

A journey into the Kozyrev Mirrors holds mysteries but can also imprison you in a place strangely similar to our own.

Disturbing Effects:

Kozyrev Mirrors can induce various effects, from visions of strange symbols to encounters with beings of light or energy orbs. However, the constant presence of The Observers instills fear and dread in all who venture into this dimension.

Explore the Threshold:

As a Psiconaut in the Kozyrev Mirrors, delve into this liminal space to uncover what happened to your friend Viktor. Analyze documents and the events of this location, so similar yet so different from your former laboratory.


Kozyrev Horrors is a short horror experience inspired by the 1990 Russian experiments with Kozyrev Mirrors. Get ready to unravel the hidden mysteries behind these sinister mirrors.

short_description: Step into the Kozyrev Mirror to unlock your Extra Sensory Perception. Beware: dread and horror await. Investigate to find an escape from this liminal space. Are you truly alone? A short and chilling singleplayer horror game, inspired by the Kozyrev Mirror experiments.
